column4: 1) Given a filename, how can I find out which package it came from. 2) How do I determine (list) dependencies for a package? 3)Is there a way to manually check a package's signature to verify its integrity?
i know, but with utilities on debian, it can't be done???

1) Given a filename, how can I find out which package it came from. 2) How do I determine (list) dependencies for a package? 3)Is there a way to manually check a package's signature to verify its integrity?
you can use apt-cache show packagename, it will show dependencies among other information
